sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card
    flat
    class="pa-3 mt-2"
  >
    <v-card-text>
      <v-progress-linear
        v-show="loadingLocale"
        indeterminate
        color="primary"
      ></v-progress-linear>
      <v-form
        v-if="!loadingLocale"
        class="multi-col-validation mt-6"
      >
        <v-row>
          <v-col
            md="4"
            cols="12"
          >
            <v-text-field
              id="emailHorizontalIcons"
              v-model="accountDataLocale.first_name"
              :error-messages="errors.first_name"
              :prepend-inner-icon="icons.mdiEmailOutline"
              outlined
              dense
              placeholder="First Name*"
              hide-details="auto"
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>
          <v-col
            md="4"
            cols="12"
          >
            <v-text-field
              id="emailHorizontalIcons"
              v-model="accountDataLocale.middle_name"
              :error-messages="errors.middle_name"
              :prepend-inner-icon="icons.mdiEmailOutline"
              outlined
              dense
              placeholder="Middle Name"
              hide-details="auto"
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>
          <v-col
            md="4"
            cols="12"
          >
            <v-text-field
              id="emailHorizontalIcons"
              v-model="accountDataLocale.last_name"
              :error-messages="errors.last_name"
              :prepend-inner-icon="icons.mdiEmailOutline"
              outlined
              dense
              placeholder="Last Name*"
              hide-details="auto"
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>
          <v-col
            md="4"
            cols="12"
          >
            <v-text-field
              id="emailHorizontalIcons"
              v-model="accountDataLocale.email"
              :error-messages="errors.email"
              :prepend-inner-icon="icons.mdiEmailOutline"
              outlined
              dense
              placeholder="Email"
              hide-details="auto"
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>
          <v-col
            md="4"
            cols="12"
          >
            <v-select
              v-model="accountDataLocale.status"
              dense
              outlined
              label="Status"
              :error-messages="errors.status"
              :items="status"
            ></v-select>
          </v-col>
          <v-col
            md="4"
            cols="12"
          >
            <v-select
              v-model="accountDataLocale.gender"
              dense
              outlined
              label="Gender"
              :error-messages="errors.gender"
              :items="genders"
            ></v-select>
          </v-col>

          <v-col cols="12">
            <v-btn
              color="primary"
              class="me-3 mt-4"
              @click="submit"
            >
              Save changes
            </v-btn>
            <v-btn
              color="info"
              outlined
              class="me-3 mt-3"
              type="reset"
              @click.prevent="goBack"
            >
              Back to Users Page
            </v-btn>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
      </v-form>
    </v-card-text>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
import {
  mdiAccountOutline,
  mdiAlertOutline,
  mdiCellphone,
  mdiCloudUploadOutline,
  mdiEmailOutline, mdiEye, mdiEyeOff, mdiHumanEdit, mdiListStatus, mdiLockOutline
} from '@mdi/js'
import { computed, ref, toRef } from '@vue/composition-api'
import store from '@/store'

export default {
  components: {
  },
  props: {
    informationData: {
      type: Object,
      default: () => ({
        first_name: '',
        middle_name: '',
        last_name: '',
        employment_type: '',
        department_id: '',
        access_level_id: '',
        gender: 'Male',
        designation: '',
        profile_url: '',
        valid_id_url: '',
        pagibig: '',
        tin: '',
        emergency_contact_address: '',
        emergency_contact_name: '',
        emergency_contact_number: '',
        birth_date: '',
        date_hired: '',
        email: '',
        password: '',
        status: '',
        is_active: '',
      }),
    },
  },
  setup(props) {
    const errors = computed(() => store.state.UserAccessManagementStore.errors)
    const loadingLocale = computed(() => store.state.UserAccessManagementStore.loading)
    const status = ['Active', 'Inactive', 'Pending', 'Deleted', 'Deactivated']
    const genders = ['Male', 'Female', 'Others']
    const accountDataLocale = toRef(props, 'informationData')
    const showAlert = ref(false)
    const resetPassword = ref({
      show: false,
    })

    accountDataLocale.value.avatarImg = require('@/assets/images/avatars/1.png')

    const goBack = () => {
      router.push('/users')
    }

    const alert = (value) => {
      resetPassword.value.show = false

      if (value !== false) {
        showAlert.value = true
        setTimeout(() => {
          showAlert.value = false
        }, 1500)
      }
    }

    const submit = () => {
      store.dispatch('UserAccessManagementStore/updateUser', {
        name: accountDataLocale.value.name,
        email: accountDataLocale.value.email,
        status: accountDataLocale.value.status,
        id: accountDataLocale.value.id,
      }).then(
        response => {
          if (response.status === undefined) {
            alert()
          }
        },
      )
    }

    return {
      alert,
      errors,
      genders,
      icons: {
        mdiAccountOutline,
        mdiEmailOutline,
        mdiCellphone,
        mdiLockOutline,
        mdiListStatus,
        mdiHumanEdit,
        mdiEye,
        mdiEyeOff,
      },
      loadingLocale,
      goBack,
      status,
      accountDataLocale,
      resetPassword,
      showAlert,
      submit,
    }
  },
}
</script>
